name: Rowdy Harvest
description:
Play as a tractor driver during a busy harvest season

  • The tractor is automatic, your job is to steer it 
  • Press left / right or A / D to steer your tractor
  • Drive through the crops to harvest it
  • Please don't hit our worker slime, their medical bill is expensive and we can't afford to lose them :/

~ Credits ~

  • Simple Notebook Paper by Cougarmint | https://opengameart.org/content/simple-notebook-paper

  • Plants and Fences by Daniel Eddeland | https://opengameart.org/users/daneeklu

  • thwack by Jordan Irwin (AntumDeluge)
